import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk generate assets from template"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/bulk/generate-from-template"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates multiple new assets from a clone template. Use this for provisioning batches of standardized assets.

**Prerequisites**
1. **CloneTemplateId** - UUID of the asset clone template.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the clone template to use.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/bulk/generate-from-template](/docs/api/assets/bulk-generate-from-template) with template ID and count.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `CloneTemplateId` and `Count`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to generate multiple assets from a clone template.","properties":{"CloneTemplateId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the asset clone template to use."},"Count":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of assets to generate from the template.","minimum":1}},"required":["CloneTemplateId","Count"],"title":"CreateCloneEntityRequest"},"example":{"CloneTemplateId":"11111111-1111-4111-8111-111111111111","Count":10}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Asset generation queued. Returns a job ID.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing a single GUID value (e.g., job ID).","properties":{"Item":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The GUID value"},"IsSuccessful":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the request was successful"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code"},"Messages":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Status or error messages"}},"required":["IsSuccessful","StatusCode"],"title":"GuidItemResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
